Georgia's Internal Affairs Ministry has begun ambitious project of new entrants of the list of prisoners who passed out national exams! A friend of mine once told me that special units against anti-authority meetings and anti-state activities by person who are presumably payed from the outside of country are already recruited with prisoners who manage to pass the exams!
 All prisoners qualified for entry get to sign contract to receive pardon, accommodation and money allowance! This is mutually beneficial co-operation, isn't it?
